backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing user profiles, contacts, and transaction history with access control and basic CRUD operations.
feature_evidence.json: Metadata describing features, related files, components, and test IDs for deployment rollback and smoke testing.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all frontend files detailing their purpose and functionality.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based theme definitions using OKLCH colors with dark mode tokens and base styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React application from main.tsx.
frontend/SMOKE_TEST.md: Checklist for validating core user flows including connection, navigation, send/receive, contacts, and contracts.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component handling Oisy authentication, profile setup, routing, and global layout with error boundaries.
Button component managing Oisy wallet connect and disconnect with loading states.
frontend/src/components/auth/PrincipalDi: Displays the connected principal with copy-to-clipboard functionality and truncated formatting.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Dialog that collects a user's name and saves it using a profile mutation.
frontend/src/components/contacts/Contact: Dialog for creating or editing a contact with validation and save/update mutations.
frontend/src/components/errors/AppErrorB: React error boundary that displays an error alert and allows reloading the app.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main layout with header, navigation, and page switching based on current view.
frontend/src/components/layout/WalletLog: Displays the app logo and styled brand name.
frontend/src/components/wallet/Recipient: Popover picker that lists contacts and lets the user select a recipient address.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, invalidating queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login, stored identity, and login state.
frontend/src/hooks/useOisyActor.ts: Creates a backend actor using the Oisy wallet identity and refreshes dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useOisyWallet.tsx: Provides a React context and mock implementation for connecting to an Oisy wallet, managing identity and connection state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, balances, transactions, and contacts via an Oisy actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets global Tailwind styles and theme variables, including light/dark modes and custom cosmic visual effects.
frontend/src/lib/branding.ts: Exports basic branding constants such as app and token names.
frontend/src/lib/icpAccountId.ts: Implements ICP account ID derivation from a principal, including SHA‑224 and CRC32 logic.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Provides utility helpers for class merging, principal truncation, and timestamp formatting.
frontend/src/lib/validation.ts: Includes validation utilities for recipient addresses and amounts, plus balance formatting and amount parsing.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/ContactsPage.tsx: Renders the contacts management page with list display, add/edit dialogs, and delete confirmation.
frontend/src/pages/ContractsPage.tsx: Provides a UI to simulate calling canister methods via Oisy Wallet, handling form input, validation, and mock responses.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Displays wallet balances and quick actions, with refresh support and Infinity Coin balance rendering.
frontend/src/pages/HistoryPage.tsx: Shows locally stored transaction history with refresh, loading states, and formatted transaction details.
frontend/src/pages/ReceivePage.tsx: Displays the user's principal address and allows copying it when the Oisy Wallet is connected.
frontend/src/pages/SendPage.tsx: Implements a multi-step send flow for Infinity Coin, including validation, confirmation, and recording transactions.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, supporting hash-based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, shadows, gradients, and plugins for a themed UI with container settings and extended utilities.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s current state, goals, known issues, and features, focusing on integrating Oisy Wallet and supporting Infinity Wallet functionality.
